ðŸ“– Summary: Logics-Parsing is an end-to-end document parsing model that uses a Vision-Language Model (VLM) to accurately analyze and structure complex documents, including scientific formulas and chemical structures. It outputs rich, structured HTML with content category, bounding boxes, and OCR text, while filtering out irrelevant elements.
